# Building a Shopify Online Store 2.0 theme (2025-11-12 15:40Z)

_**User (2025-11-12 15:40Z)**_

> You are my Senior Shopify Theme Engineer.



> 

> 

> Your job is to help me plan and build a complete Online Store 2.0 theme using best practices.

> 

> Technical rules:

> 

> - Use Shopify Online Store 2.0 architecture only (sections everywhere, JSON templates). [Shopify+2Shopify+2](https://www.shopify.com/ca/partners/blog/shopify-online-store?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

> - Respect folder structure: `layout/`, `templates/`, `sections/`, `snippets/`, `assets/`, `config/`, `locales/`.

> - Each section must include a `{% schema %}` that’s clear for non-devs.

> - Assume I’m a beginner: always tell me where each file goes and why: <!DOCTYPE html>

    <!-- 

      Inline JavaScript

      1. Lucide icons activation

      2. Mobile menu toggle logic

    -->

    <script>

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {

            // 1. Initialize Lucide Icons

            try {

                if (lucide) {

                    lucide.createIcons();

                } else {

                    console.error('Lucide library not loaded.');

                }

            } catch (e) {

                console.error('Error initializing Lucide icons:', e);

            }



            // 2. Mobile Menu Toggle

            const openButton = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-open');

            const closeButton = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-close');

            const mobileMenu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');



            if (openButton && closeButton && mobileMenu) {

                openButton.addEventListener('click', () => {

                    mobileMenu.classList.remove('hidden');

                    mobileMenu.classList.add('flex');

                    document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; // Prevent scrolling

                });



                closeButton.addEventListener('click', () => {

                    mobileMenu.classList.add('hidden');

                    mobileMenu.classList.remove('flex');

                    document.body.style.overflow = ''; // Re-enable scrolling

                });

            } else {

                console.error('Mobile menu elements not found.');

            }

        });

    </script>



</body>

```diff
+       &quot;type&quot;: &quot;header-group&quot;,
+       &quot;blocks&quot;: {
+         &quot;announcement-bar&quot;: {
+           &quot;type&quot;: &quot;announcement-bar&quot;
+         },
+         &quot;header&quot;: {
+           &quot;type&quot;: &quot;header&quot;
+         }
+       },
+       &quot;max_blocks&quot;: 2
+     },
+     &quot;footer-group&quot;: {
+       &quot;type&quot;: &quot;footer-group&quot;,
+       &quot;blocks&quot;: {
+         &quot;footer&quot;: {
+           &quot;type&quot;: &quot;footer&quot;
+         }
+       },
+       &quot;max_blocks&quot;: 1
+     }
+   },
+   &quot;content_for_index&quot;: [
+     &quot;hero&quot;,
+     &quot;featured-collection&quot;,
+     &quot;how-it-works&quot;,
+     &quot;brand-story&quot;,
+     &quot;newsletter&quot;
+   ]
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
+   {%- if product.price_varies == false and product.compare_at_price_varies %} price--no-compare{% endif -%}

+             {% else %}
+               {{ compare_at_price | money }}
+             {% endif %}
+           &lt;/s&gt;
+         &lt;/span&gt;
+       {%- endunless -%}
+       &lt;span class=&quot;visually-hidden visually-hidden--inline&quot;&gt;{{ &#39;products.product.price.sale_price&#39; | t }}&lt;/span&gt;
+       &lt;span class=&quot;price-item price-item--sale price-item--last&quot;&gt;
+         {{ money_price }}
+       &lt;/span&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;small class=&quot;unit-price caption{% unless target.unit_price_measurement %} hidden{% endunless %}&quot;&gt;
+       &lt;span class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot;&gt;{{ &#39;products.product.price.unit_price&#39; | t }}&lt;/span&gt;
+       &lt;span class=&quot;price-item price-item--last&quot;&gt;
+         &lt;span&gt;{{- target.unit_price | money -}}&lt;/span&gt;
+         &lt;span aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;/&lt;/span&gt;
+         &lt;span class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;{{ &#39;accessibility.unit_price_separator&#39; | t }}&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;
+         &lt;span&gt;
+           {%- if target.unit_price_measurement.reference_value != 1 -%}
+             {{- target.unit_price_measurement.reference_value -}}
+           {%- endif -%}
+           {{ target.unit_price_measurement.reference_unit }}
+         &lt;/span&gt;
+       &lt;/span&gt;
+     &lt;/small&gt;
+   &lt;/div&gt;
+   {%- if show_badges -%}
+     &lt;span class=&quot;badge price__badge-sale color-{{ settings.sale_badge_color_scheme }}&quot;&gt;
+       {{ &#39;products.product.on_sale&#39; | t }}
+     &lt;/span&gt;
+ 
+     &lt;span class=&quot;badge price__badge-sold-out color-{{ settings.sold_out_badge_color_scheme }}&quot;&gt;
+       {{ &#39;products.product.sold_out&#39; | t }}
```

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,48 @@
- 
+ // Global JavaScript for Sloe Fit Theme
+ 
+ if (!window.theme) {
+   window.theme = {};
+ }
+ 
+ // Utility function to debounce
+ window.theme.debounce = function(func, wait) {
+   let timeout;
+   return function executedFunction(...args) {
+     const later = () =&gt; {
+       clearTimeout(timeout);
+       func(...args);
+     };
+     clearTimeout(timeout);
+     timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ // Mobile menu functionality
+ document.addEventListener(&#39;DOMContentLoaded&#39;, function() {
+   const mobileMenuOpen = document.getElementById(&#39;mobile-menu-open&#39;);
+   const mobileMenuClose = document.getElementById(&#39;mobile-menu-close&#39;);
+   const mobileMenu = document.getElementById(&#39;mobile-menu&#39;);
+ 
+   if (mobileMenuOpen &amp;&amp; mobileMenuClose &amp;&amp; mobileMenu) {
+     mobileMenuOpen.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; {
+       mobileMenu.classList.remove(&#39;hidden&#39;);
+       mobileMenu.classList.add(&#39;flex&#39;);
+       document.body.style.overflow = &#39;hidden&#39;;
+     });
+ 
+     mobileMenuClose.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; {
+       mobileMenu.classList.add(&#39;hidden&#39;);
+       mobileMenu.classList.remove(&#39;flex&#39;);
+       document.body.style.overflow = &#39;&#39;;
+     });
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ // Initialize any lazy-loaded components
+ if (&#39;loading&#39; in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
+   const images = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;img[loading=&quot;lazy&quot;]&#39;);
+   images.forEach(img =&gt; {
+     img.src = img.dataset.src || img.src;
+   });
+ }
+
```

Creating a README to explain the theme structure and how everything works:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: README.md</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 207, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,207 @@
- 
+ # Sloe Fit Shopify Theme
+ 
+ A complete Shopify Online Store 2.0 theme built with best practices for the Sloe Fit brand.
+ 
+ ## 📁 Folder Structure
+ 
+ Here&#39;s where everything goes and why:
+ 
+ ### &#96;layout/theme.liquid&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;layout/theme.liquid&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** This is the main HTML wrapper for your entire store. It contains the &#96;&lt;head&gt;&#96; and &#96;&lt;body&gt;&#96; tags, and wraps all page content. Think of it as the skeleton of your site.
+ 
+ **What it does:**
+ - Loads fonts and CSS
+ - Sets up theme settings and color variables
+ - Includes the header and footer sections
+ - Wraps all page content
+ 
+ ### &#96;templates/index.json&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;templates/index.json&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** This is the homepage template. It defines which sections appear on your homepage and in what order.
+ 
+ **How to use:**
+ - Edit this file to add, remove, or reorder sections on your homepage
+ - Each section listed here will appear on the homepage
+ 
+ ### &#96;sections/&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;sections/&#96; folder  
+ **Purpose:** Each file here is a reusable section that can be added to any page via the theme editor.
+ 
+ **Sections included:**
+ - &#96;announcement-bar.liquid&#96; - Top announcement bar
+ - &#96;header.liquid&#96; - Main navigation header
+ - &#96;hero.liquid&#96; - Large hero section with headline and CTAs
+ - &#96;featured-collection.liquid&#96; - Displays products from a collection
+ - &#96;how-it-works.liquid&#96; - Three-column &quot;ecosystem&quot; explanation
+ - &#96;brand-story.liquid&#96; - Image + text trust builder section
+ - &#96;newsletter.liquid&#96; - Email signup form
+ - &#96;footer.liquid&#96; - Site footer with links
+ 
+ **How to use:**
+ - Each section has a &#96;{% schema %}&#96; block at the bottom
+ - The schema defines settings that appear in the Shopify theme editor
+ - You can customize each section without touching code!
+ 
+ ### &#96;snippets/&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;snippets/&#96; folder  
+ **Purpose:** Reusable code chunks that can be included in sections or other snippets.
+ 
+ **Snippets included:**
+ - &#96;product-card.liquid&#96; - Displays a product card
+ - &#96;product-card-placeholder.liquid&#96; - Placeholder for products
+ - &#96;price.liquid&#96; - Formats and displays product prices
+ - &#96;meta-tags.liquid&#96; - SEO meta tags
+ - &#96;icon-*.liquid&#96; - Various icon SVGs
+ 
+ **How to use:**
+ - Include snippets in sections using: &#96;{% render &#39;snippet-name&#39; %}&#96;
+ 
+ ### &#96;assets/&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;assets/&#96; folder  
+ **Purpose:** CSS, JavaScript, images, and other static files.
+ 
+ **Files included:**
+ - &#96;base.css&#96; - Main stylesheet with base styles
+ - &#96;global.js&#96; - Global JavaScript functionality
+ 
+ **How to use:**
+ - Reference in Liquid files: &#96;{{ &#39;filename.css&#39; | asset_url | stylesheet_tag }}&#96;
+ - Or in JavaScript: &#96;{{ &#39;filename.js&#39; | asset_url | script_tag }}&#96;
+ 
+ ### &#96;config/theme.json&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;config/theme.json&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** Theme-wide settings like colors, fonts, and layout options.
+ 
+ **What you can customize:**
+ - Colors (primary accent, text, backgrounds)
+ - Typography (heading and body fonts)
+ - Page width
+ - Button styles
+ - Product card styles
+ 
+ **How to use:**
+ - Edit this file to change default theme settings
+ - Settings appear in Theme Settings in the Shopify admin
+ 
+ ### &#96;locales/en.default.json&#96;
+ **Location:** &#96;locales/en.default.json&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** All text strings for the theme. Makes it easy to translate or change wording.
+ 
+ **How to use:**
+ - Edit text here to change labels throughout the theme
+ - Reference in Liquid: &#96;{{ &#39;key.path&#39; | t }}&#96;
+ 
+ ## 🎨 Design System
+ 
+ ### Colors
+ - **Primary Accent:** &#96;#C8FF00&#96; (Electric Lime) - Used for buttons and highlights
+ - **Background:** &#96;#121212&#96; (Dark) - Main background
+ - **Background Alt:** &#96;#1E1E1E&#96; (Dark Alt) - Secondary backgrounds
+ - **Text:** &#96;#FFFFFF&#96; (White) - Primary text color
+ 
+ ### Typography
+ - **Headings:** Inter Black (bold, uppercase)
+ - **Body:** Inter Regular (clean, readable)
+ 
+ ## 🚀 Getting Started
+ 
+ 1. **Upload to Shopify:**
+    - Zip this entire folder
+    - Go to Shopify Admin → Online Store → Themes
+    - Click &quot;Add theme&quot; → &quot;Upload zip file&quot;
+ 
+ 2. **Customize Sections:**
+    - Go to Theme Editor
+    - Click any section to customize it
+    - Settings are explained in each section&#39;s schema
+ 
+ 3. **Set Up Collections:**
+    - Create a collection called &quot;The Starter Stack&quot;
+    - Add your products to it
+    - The featured collection section will automatically display them
+ 
+ 4. **Configure Menus:**
+    - Go to Navigation in Shopify admin
+    - Create menus for: Shop, Company, Support
+    - Assign them in the Header and Footer sections
+ 
+ ## 📝 Section Customization Guide
+ 
+ ### Hero Section
+ - **Heading:** Main headline
+ - **Text:** Subheadline
+ - **Primary Button:** Main CTA (links to collection)
+ - **Secondary Button:** Secondary CTA (links to AI Coach page)
+ 
+ ### Featured Collection
+ - **Collection:** Select which collection to display
+ - **Products to Show:** How many products (default: 3)
+ - **Title &amp; Description:** Section heading and description
+ 
+ ### How It Works
+ - Add up to 3 &quot;Step&quot; blocks
+ - Each step has: Number, Heading, and Text
+ - Perfect for explaining your ecosystem
+ 
+ ### Brand Story
+ - **Image:** Upload a trust-building image
+ - **Title &amp; Text:** Your brand story
+ - **Button:** Link to full story page
+ 
+ ### Newsletter
+ - Automatically connects to Shopify&#39;s customer email system
+ - **Title &amp; Text:** Signup messaging
+ - **Button Label:** Submit button text
+ 
+ ### Footer
+ - Add multiple columns using blocks
+ - **Text Column:** Logo, mission, social icons
+ - **Menu Column:** Link lists (Shop, Company, Support)
+ 
+ ## 🛠️ Customization Tips
+ 
+ 1. **Change Colors:**
+    - Edit &#96;config/theme.json&#96; → &#96;colors_accent_1&#96; for primary color
+    - Or use Theme Settings in Shopify admin
+ 
+ 2. **Add New Sections:**
+    - Create a new &#96;.liquid&#96; file in &#96;sections/&#96;
+    - Add a &#96;{% schema %}&#96; block with settings
+    - Add it to &#96;templates/index.json&#96; to show on homepage
+ 
+ 3. **Modify Styles:**
+    - Edit &#96;assets/base.css&#96; for global styles
+    - Each section has its own &#96;{% style %}&#96; block for section-specific styles
+ 
+ 4. **Add Icons:**
+    - Create SVG files in &#96;snippets/icon-*.liquid&#96;
+    - Reference them: &#96;{% render &#39;icon-name&#39; %}&#96;
+ 
+ ## 📚 Resources
+ 
+ - [Shopify Theme Development Docs](https://shopify.dev/themes)
+ - [Liquid Template Language](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/liquid)
+ - [Online Store 2.0](https://www.shopify.com/partners/blog/shopify-online-store-2-0)
+ 
+ ## ⚠️ Important Notes
+ 
+ - Always test changes in a development theme first
+ - Backup your theme before making major changes
+ - Use the Theme Editor when possible (no code required!)
+ - Each section&#39;s schema makes it easy for non-developers to customize
+ 
+ ## 🎯 Next Steps
+ 
+ 1. Upload and activate the theme
+ 2. Customize sections via Theme Editor
+ 3. Add your products and collections
+ 4. Set up navigation menus
+ 5. Configure theme settings (colors, fonts)
+ 6. Test on mobile devices
+ 7. Launch! 🚀
+ 
+ ---
+ 
+ **Need Help?** Each section includes helpful info in its schema explaining what each setting does. The Theme Editor makes it easy to customize without coding!
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,135 @@
- 
+ # Quick Start Guide - Sloe Fit Theme
+ 
+ ## 🎯 First Steps (5 Minutes)
+ 
+ ### 1. Upload Your Theme
+ 1. Zip the entire theme folder
+ 2. Go to Shopify Admin → **Online Store** → **Themes**
+ 3. Click **&quot;Add theme&quot;** → **&quot;Upload zip file&quot;**
+ 4. Select your zip file and wait for upload
+ 5. Click **&quot;Actions&quot;** → **&quot;Publish&quot;** to make it live
+ 
+ ### 2. Customize Your Homepage (Theme Editor)
+ 1. Go to **Online Store** → **Themes** → Click **&quot;Customize&quot;**
+ 2. You&#39;ll see all your sections on the left
+ 3. Click any section to edit it (no coding needed!)
+ 
+ ### 3. Essential Settings
+ 
+ #### Announcement Bar
+ - Click **&quot;Announcement Bar&quot;** section
+ - Edit the message text
+ - Add a link if you want it clickable
+ 
+ #### Header
+ - Click **&quot;Header&quot;** section
+ - Upload your logo (or it will show &quot;Sloe Fit&quot; text)
+ - Select your main menu from the dropdown
+ 
+ #### Hero Section
+ - Click **&quot;Hero&quot;** section
+ - Edit the heading: &quot;Your Complete Fitness Ecosystem.&quot;
+ - Edit the text
+ - Set button links:
+   - Primary: Link to your collection (e.g., &#96;/collections/starter-stack&#96;)
+   - Secondary: Link to AI Coach page (e.g., &#96;/pages/ai-coach&#96;)
+ 
+ #### Featured Collection
+ - Click **&quot;Featured Collection&quot;** section
+ - **IMPORTANT:** Select your collection (create &quot;The Starter Stack&quot; collection first!)
+ - Set how many products to show (default: 3)
+ 
+ #### How It Works
+ - Click **&quot;How It Works&quot;** section
+ - You&#39;ll see 3 &quot;Step&quot; blocks
+ - Click each block to edit:
+   - Number (01., 02., 03.)
+   - Heading
+   - Text
+ 
+ #### Brand Story
+ - Click **&quot;Brand Story&quot;** section
+ - Upload an image
+ - Edit the title and text
+ - Set the button link (e.g., &#96;/pages/our-story&#96;)
+ 
+ #### Newsletter
+ - Click **&quot;Newsletter&quot;** section
+ - Edit the title and text
+ - The form automatically works with Shopify&#39;s email system!
+ 
+ #### Footer
+ - Click **&quot;Footer&quot;** section
+ - You&#39;ll see 4 column blocks
+ - Edit each column:
+   - First column: Logo text and mission statement
+   - Other columns: Select menus (create these in Navigation first!)
+ 
+ ### 4. Create Your Collections
+ 1. Go to **Products** → **Collections**
+ 2. Click **&quot;Create collection&quot;**
+ 3. Name it **&quot;The Starter Stack&quot;**
+ 4. Add your products to it
+ 5. The Featured Collection section will automatically show these products!
+ 
+ ### 5. Set Up Navigation Menus
+ 1. Go to **Online Store** → **Navigation**
+ 2. Create menus:
+    - **Main menu:** Shop, The AI Coach, Our Story, The Guide
+    - **Footer menus:** Shop links, Company links, Support links
+ 3. Assign the main menu in the Header section
+ 4. Assign footer menus in the Footer section
+ 
+ ### 6. Configure Theme Settings
+ 1. In Theme Editor, click **&quot;Theme settings&quot;** (bottom left)
+ 2. Set your colors:
+    - Primary Accent: &#96;#C8FF00&#96; (Electric Lime)
+    - Background: &#96;#121212&#96; (Dark)
+    - Text: &#96;#FFFFFF&#96; (White)
+ 3. Choose fonts (Inter recommended)
+ 4. Adjust page width if needed
+ 
+ ## ✅ Checklist Before Launch
+ 
+ - [ ] Theme uploaded and published
+ - [ ] Logo uploaded in Header section
+ - [ ] Main navigation menu created and assigned
+ - [ ] &quot;The Starter Stack&quot; collection created with products
+ - [ ] Hero section buttons linked correctly
+ - [ ] How It Works section customized
+ - [ ] Brand Story image and text added
+ - [ ] Footer menus created and assigned
+ - [ ] Theme colors configured
+ - [ ] Tested on mobile device
+ - [ ] All links work correctly
+ 
+ ## 🆘 Common Issues
+ 
+ ### Products Not Showing?
+ - Make sure you&#39;ve created the collection
+ - Check that products are added to the collection
+ - Verify the collection is selected in the Featured Collection section
+ 
+ ### Menu Not Showing?
+ - Create the menu in Navigation first
+ - Then select it in the Header or Footer section settings
+ 
+ ### Colors Not Right?
+ - Go to Theme Settings → Colors
+ - Or edit &#96;config/theme.json&#96; directly
+ 
+ ### Can&#39;t Find a Section?
+ - All sections are in the Theme Editor sidebar
+ - Click **&quot;Add section&quot;** to add more
+ - Drag sections to reorder them
+ 
+ ## 📞 Need More Help?
+ 
+ - Check &#96;README.md&#96; for detailed documentation
+ - Each section has helpful info in its settings
+ - Shopify Theme Docs: https://shopify.dev/themes
+ 
+ ---
+ 
+ **Pro Tip:** Use the Theme Editor as much as possible - it&#39;s designed for non-developers! Only edit code files if you need advanced customization.
+
```

---


## Theme structure

### Core files
- `layout/theme.liquid` — Main theme wrapper with head/body structure
- `config/theme.json` — Theme settings (colors, fonts, layout)
- `templates/index.json` — Homepage template with section order

### Sections (customizable in Theme Editor)
- `announcement-bar.liquid` — Top announcement bar
- `header.liquid` — Navigation with logo, menu, search, cart
- `hero.liquid` — Hero with headline and dual CTAs
- `featured-collection.liquid` — Product grid from a collection
- `how-it-works.liquid` — Three-step ecosystem explanation
- `brand-story.liquid` — Image + text trust builder
- `newsletter.liquid` — Email signup form
- `footer.liquid` — Four-column footer with links

### Supporting files
- `snippets/` — Reusable components (product cards, icons, price formatting)
- `assets/` — CSS and JavaScript files
- `locales/en.default.json` — All text strings for easy translation

## Design system

- Colors: Electric Lime (`#C8FF00`), Dark backgrounds (`#121212`, `#1E1E1E`), White text
- Typography: Inter font family (Black for headings, Regular for body)
- Layout: Responsive grid system, max-width containers

## Next steps

1. Read `QUICK_START.md` for a 5-minute setup guide
2. Read `README.md` for detailed documentation
3. Upload the theme to Shopify:
   - Zip the entire folder
   - Upload via Shopify Admin → Themes → Add theme
4. Customize in Theme Editor — each section has settings explained in its schema

## Features

- Online Store 2.0 architecture — All sections are JSON-based and customizable
- Beginner-friendly — Each section includes clear schema descriptions
- Responsive — Mobile-first design
- SEO-ready — Proper meta tags and semantic HTML
- Accessible — ARIA labels and keyboard navigation

## Important notes

1. Create collections first — The Featured Collection section needs a collection (e.g., "The Starter Stack")
2. Set up menus — Create navigation menus in Shopify Admin → Navigation
3. Upload logo — Add your logo in the Header section settings
4. Test links — Make sure all button links point to the correct pages

The theme is ready to upload. Each section can be customized through the Shopify Theme Editor without code. If you need adjustments or have questions, let me know.

---

    <title>Sloe Fit - PureWhey Isolate</title>



    <!-- Tailwind CSS CDN -->

    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>



    <!-- Google Fonts (Inter) -->

    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">

    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>

    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;700;800;900&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">



    <!-- Lucide Icons -->

    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.min.js"></script>



    <!-- Custom Tailwind Configuration -->

    <script>

        tailwind.config = {

            theme: {

                extend: {

                    colors: {

                        'primary': '#C8FF00',

                        'white': '#FFFFFF',

                        'dark': '#121212',

                        'dark-alt': '#1E1E1E',

                        'text-primary': '#FFFFFF',

                        'text-secondary': '#E0E0E0',

                        'text-muted': '#AAAAAA',

                        'dark-text': '#121212', // For use on primary-bg elements

                    },

                        sans: ['Inter', 'sans-serif'],

                    },

                    borderRadius: {

                        'lg': '8px',

                        'xl': '12px',

                        '2xl': '16px',

                    },

                    maxWidth: {

                        '6xl': '1200px',

                    }

                }

            }

        }

    </script>

        /* Base styles */

            font-feature-settings: 'cv03', 'cv04', 'cv11';

        }

        /* Simple styling for number input */

        input[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,

        input[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {

            -webkit-appearance: none;

            margin: 0;

        }

        input[type="number"] {

            -moz-appearance: textfield;

        }

    </style>

    <!-- 

      Inline JavaScript

      1. Lucide icons activation

      2. Mobile menu toggle logic

      3. Quantity selector logic

    -->

    <script>

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {

            // 1. Initialize Lucide Icons

            try {

                if (lucide) {

                    lucide.createIcons();

                } else {

                    console.error('Lucide library not loaded.');

                }

            } catch (e) {

                console.error('Error initializing Lucide icons:', e);

            }



            // 2. Mobile Menu Toggle

            const openButton = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-open');

            const closeButton = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-close');

            const mobileMenu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');



            if (openButton && closeButton && mobileMenu) {

                openButton.addEventListener('click', () => {

                    mobileMenu.classList.remove('hidden');

                    mobileMenu.classList.add('flex');

                    document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; // Prevent scrolling

                });



                closeButton.addEventListener('click', () => {

                    mobileMenu.classList.add('hidden');

                    mobileMenu.classList.remove('flex');

                    document.body.style.overflow = ''; // Re-enable scrolling

                });

            } else {

                console.warn('Mobile menu elements not found on this page.');

            }



            // 3. Quantity Selector Logic

            const qtyMinus = document.getElementById('qty-minus');

            const qtyPlus = document.getElementById('qty-plus');

            const qtyInput = document.getElementById('quantity-input');



            if (qtyMinus && qtyPlus && qtyInput) {

                qtyMinus.addEventListener('click', () => {

                    let currentValue = parseInt(qtyInput.value, 10);

                    if (currentValue > 1) {

                        qtyInput.value = currentValue - 1;

                    }

                });



                qtyPlus.addEventListener('click', () => {

                    let currentValue = parseInt(qtyInput.value, 10);

                    qtyInput.value = currentValue + 1;

                });

            } else {

                console.warn('Quantity selector elements not found on this page.');

            }



        });

    </script>



</body>

</html>

```diff
+ &lt;script&gt;
+   document.addEventListener(&#39;DOMContentLoaded&#39;, function() {
+     const sectionId = &#39;{{ section.id }}&#39;;
+     const qtyMinus = document.getElementById(&#39;qty-minus-&#39; + sectionId);
+     const qtyPlus = document.getElementById(&#39;qty-plus-&#39; + sectionId);
+     const qtyInput = document.getElementById(&#39;Quantity-&#39; + sectionId);
+     const thumbnails = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.main-product__thumbnail&#39;);
+     const mainImage = document.getElementById(&#39;main-product-image&#39;);
+ 
+     // Quantity controls
+     if (qtyMinus &amp;&amp; qtyPlus &amp;&amp; qtyInput) {
+       qtyMinus.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; {
+         let currentValue = parseInt(qtyInput.value, 10);
+         if (currentValue &gt; 1) {
+           qtyInput.value = currentValue - 1;
+         }
+       });
+ 
+       qtyPlus.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; {
+         let currentValue = parseInt(qtyInput.value, 10);
+         qtyInput.value = currentValue + 1;
+       });
+     }
+ 
+     // Image gallery
+     if (thumbnails.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; mainImage) {
+       thumbnails.forEach(thumbnail =&gt; {
+         thumbnail.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, function() {
+           const img = this.querySelector(&#39;img&#39;);
+           if (img) {
+             mainImage.src = img.src.replace(/width=\d+/, &#39;width=800&#39;);
+             thumbnails.forEach(t =&gt; t.classList.remove(&#39;main-product__thumbnail--active&#39;));
+             this.classList.add(&#39;main-product__thumbnail--active&#39;);
+           }
+         });
+       });
+     }
+   });
+ &lt;/script&gt;
+
```

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,177 @@
- 
+ # Product Page Guide - Sloe Fit Theme
+ 
+ ## 📄 Product Template Structure
+ 
+ The product page is built using **Online Store 2.0** architecture with three main sections:
+ 
+ ### 1. Main Product Section (&#96;sections/main-product.liquid&#96;)
+ **Location:** &#96;sections/main-product.liquid&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** Displays the product details, images, and add-to-cart functionality.
+ 
+ **Features:**
+ - ✅ Breadcrumb navigation
+ - ✅ Product image gallery with thumbnails
+ - ✅ Product title and description
+ - ✅ Price display
+ - ✅ Customizable bullet points (key benefits)
+ - ✅ Variant selector (if product has variants)
+ - ✅ Quantity selector with +/- buttons
+ - ✅ Add to cart button
+ 
+ **Customization:**
+ - Go to Theme Editor → Click &quot;Main Product&quot; section
+ - **Show Bullet Points:** Toggle to show/hide benefits
+ - **Bullet Points:** Enter one benefit per line (e.g., &quot;25g Protein Per Serving&quot;)
+ - **Color Scheme:** Choose the color scheme
+ 
+ ### 2. Product Trust Section (&#96;sections/product-trust.liquid&#96;)
+ **Location:** &#96;sections/product-trust.liquid&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** Builds trust with key selling points and certifications.
+ 
+ **Features:**
+ - ✅ Customizable title
+ - ✅ Up to 3 trust items (blocks)
+ - ✅ Icon selection (Check, Flask, Award)
+ - ✅ Heading and description for each item
+ 
+ **Customization:**
+ - Go to Theme Editor → Click &quot;Product Trust&quot; section
+ - **Title:** Main heading (e.g., &quot;Transparently Sourced, No Guesswork.&quot;)
+ - **Trust Items:** Click &quot;Add block&quot; to add more items
+ - Each block has:
+   - **Icon:** Choose from Check Circle, Flask, or Award
+   - **Heading:** Title (e.g., &quot;Zero Added Sugar&quot;)
+   - **Text:** Description (e.g., &quot;Only clean, effective ingredients.&quot;)
+ 
+ ### 3. Product Recommendations Section (&#96;sections/product-recommendations.liquid&#96;)
+ **Location:** &#96;sections/product-recommendations.liquid&#96;  
+ **Purpose:** Shows related products from the same collection (cross-sell).
+ 
+ **Features:**
+ - ✅ Customizable title
+ - ✅ Automatically excludes current product
+ - ✅ Shows products from the same collection
+ - ✅ Uses product cards for consistent styling
+ 
+ **Customization:**
+ - Go to Theme Editor → Click &quot;Product Recommendations&quot; section
+ - **Title:** Heading (e.g., &quot;COMPLETE THE STARTER STACK&quot;)
+ - **Collection:** Select which collection to pull from (defaults to product&#39;s collection)
+ - **Products to Show:** Number of products (2-4, default: 2)
+ 
+ ## 🎨 Design Features
+ 
+ ### Image Gallery
+ - Main product image displays at 800px width
+ - Up to 4 thumbnail images below
+ - Click thumbnails to change main image
+ - Active thumbnail highlighted with primary color border
+ 
+ ### Quantity Selector
+ - Clean +/- buttons
+ - Number input in the middle
+ - Minimum value: 1
+ - Styled to match theme
+ 
+ ### Bullet Points
+ - Green checkmark icons
+ - Customizable list of benefits
+ - One benefit per line in settings
+ 
+ ## 📝 Setup Instructions
+ 
+ ### 1. Product Images
+ 1. Go to **Products** → Select your product
+ 2. Upload product images (at least 1, up to 4 for gallery)
+ 3. First image becomes the main image
+ 4. Next 3 images become thumbnails
+ 
+ ### 2. Product Description
+ 1. In product settings, add a **Description**
+ 2. This appears below the product title
+ 3. Supports basic HTML formatting
+ 
+ ### 3. Bullet Points
+ 1. Go to Theme Editor → **Main Product** section
+ 2. Enable &quot;Show Bullet Points&quot;
+ 3. Enter benefits, one per line:
+    &#96;&#96;&#96;
+    25g Protein Per Serving
+    Transparently Sourced
+    Zero Added Sugar
+    Mixes Instantly
+    &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ 
+ ### 4. Trust Section
+ 1. Go to Theme Editor → **Product Trust** section
+ 2. Edit the title
+ 3. Customize the 3 default blocks or add more
+ 4. Choose icons and edit text
+ 
+ ### 5. Recommendations
+ 1. Make sure your product is in a collection
+ 2. Go to Theme Editor → **Product Recommendations** section
+ 3. Select the collection (or it uses product&#39;s collection automatically)
+ 4. Set how many products to show
+ 
+ ## 🔧 Advanced Customization
+ 
+ ### Adding More Sections
+ You can add any section to the product template:
+ 1. Go to Theme Editor
+ 2. Click &quot;Add section&quot;
+ 3. Choose from available sections
+ 4. Drag to reorder
+ 
+ ### Variant Support
+ - If your product has variants (size, color, etc.), they automatically appear
+ - Variants are shown as dropdown selects
+ - Price updates based on selected variant
+ 
+ ### Custom Fields
+ To add custom product fields:
+ 1. Use Shopify metafields
+ 2. Reference in Liquid: &#96;{{ product.metafields.custom.field_name }}&#96;
+ 
+ ## 📱 Mobile Responsive
+ 
+ All sections are fully responsive:
+ - Image gallery stacks on mobile
+ - Product info takes full width on mobile
+ - Trust items stack vertically on mobile
+ - Recommendations show 1 column on mobile
+ 
+ ## ✅ Checklist
+ 
+ Before launching, make sure:
+ - [ ] Product images uploaded (at least 1)
+ - [ ] Product description added
+ - [ ] Bullet points configured
+ - [ ] Trust section customized
+ - [ ] Product is in a collection (for recommendations)
+ - [ ] Price is set correctly
+ - [ ] Variants configured (if applicable)
+ - [ ] Tested on mobile device
+ - [ ] Add to cart button works
+ 
+ ## 🆘 Common Issues
+ 
+ ### Images Not Showing?
+ - Make sure images are uploaded to the product
+ - Check image file sizes (Shopify has limits)
+ - Verify images are published
+ 
+ ### Recommendations Not Showing?
+ - Ensure product is in a collection
+ - Check that collection has other products
+ - Verify collection is selected in section settings
+ 
+ ### Variants Not Working?
+ - Make sure variants are created in product settings
+ - Check variant prices are set
+ - Verify inventory is available
+ 
+ ---
+ 
+ **Pro Tip:** Use the Theme Editor to customize everything visually - no code required! Each section has helpful descriptions explaining what each setting does.
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

Created the product page template and sections. Summary:

## Product page created

### Files created

1. `templates/product.json` — Product page template
   - Defines which sections appear on product pages
   - Order: Main Product → Product Trust → Product Recommendations

2. `sections/main-product.liquid` — Main product section
   - Product image gallery with thumbnails
   - Product title, description, and price
   - Customizable bullet points (key benefits)
   - Variant selector (if product has variants)
   - Quantity selector with +/- buttons
   - Add to cart button
   - Breadcrumb navigation

3. `sections/product-trust.liquid` — Trust section
   - Three trust badges with icons
   - Customizable icons (Check, Flask, Award)
   - Heading and description for each badge

4. `sections/product-recommendations.liquid` — Cross-sell section
   - Shows related products from the same collection
   - Automatically excludes the current product
   - Uses product cards for consistent styling

5. Icon snippets created:
   - `icon-check-circle.liquid`
   - `icon-minus.liquid`
   - `icon-plus.liquid`
   - `icon-flask.liquid`
   - `icon-award.liquid`

6. Updated `locales/en.default.json` with new translations

## Features

- Image gallery: Main image + up to 4 thumbnails (click to change main image)
- Quantity selector: +/- buttons with number input
- Bullet points: Customizable benefits list with checkmark icons
- Trust badges: Three customizable trust points with icons
- Recommendations: Shows other products from the same collection
- Responsive: Mobile-friendly layout
- Variant support: Automatic variant dropdowns if product has variants

## How to use

1. Upload the theme to Shopify
2. Go to Theme Editor → Product pages
3. Customize each section:
   - Main Product: Add bullet points, adjust settings
   - Product Trust: Edit trust badges
   - Product Recommendations: Select collection, set number of products

## Documentation

Created `PRODUCT_PAGE_GUIDE.md` with:
- Section explanations
- Customization instructions
- Setup checklist
- Troubleshooting tips

The product page matches your HTML design and uses Shopify Online Store 2.0 architecture. All sections are customizable through the Theme Editor without code.

Ready to upload and test. If you need adjustments, let me know.
